mapper.select: SELECT -- (productInfo) a.auction_item_id, a.auction_item_name, a.auction_item_explain, a.auction_item_start_price, a.auction_item_highest_price, a.auction_item_end_time, a.created_at, c.category_value AS category, a.auction_item_status, a.auction_item_condition, -- (sellerInfo) u.user_email, u.user_trust_score, u.user_nickname, ARRAY_AGG(f.file_path) AS file_paths, -- 경매 참여 내역을 ARRAY_AGG로 묶어서 가져오기 ARRAY_AGG( JSON_BUILD_OBJECT( 'auction_join_id', ja.auction_join_id, 'auction_join_user_id', ja.user_id, 'auction_join_price', ja.auction_join_price, 'auction_join_status', ja.auction_join_status, 'auction_join_created_at', ja.created_at, 'auction_join_user_nickname', uj.user_email ) ) AS tbl_auction_join FROM tbl_auction_item a JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_detail = a.category_id -- 카테고리 정보를 연결 (필요한 경우) JOIN tbl_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id -- 사용자 정보 연결 LEFT JOIN tbl_file f ON a.auction_item_id = f.used_item_id -- 파일 경로 정보 연결 LEFT JOIN tbl_auction_join ja ON a.auction_item_id = ja.auction_item_id -- 경매 참여 내역을 연결 LEFT JOIN tbl_user uj ON ja.user_id = uj.user_id -- 경매 참여자의 이메일을 가져오기 위한 JOIN WHERE a.auction_item_id = #{auctionItemId} GROUP BY a.auction_item_id, a.auction_item_name, a.auction_item_explain, a.auction_item_start_price, a.auction_item_highest_price, a.auction_item_end_time, a.created_at, c.category_value, a.auction_item_status, a.auction_item_condition, u.user_email, u.user_trust_score, u.user_nickname;

SELECT AI.*, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT(AJ.auction_join_id)),0) AS bid_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT(tbl_like.user_id)),0) AS like_count, CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN tbl_like.user_id = 1 THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS my_favorite_auction FROM tbl_auction_item AS AI LEFT JOIN tbl_auction_join AS AJ ON AI.auction_item_id = AJ.auction_item_id LEFT JOIN tbl_like ON AI.auction_item_id = tbl_like.auction_item_id
AND AI.category_id = #{searchDTO.category}
AND AI.auction_item_highest_price >= #{searchDTO.minPrice}
AND AI.auction_item_highest_price <= #{searchDTO.maxPrice}
AND AI.auction_item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
GROUP BY AI.auction_item_id
ORDER BY created_at ASC
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY auction_item_highest_price ASC
ORDER BY auction_item_highest_price DESC
ORDER BY likes DESC

SELECT A.*, COALESCE(MIN(C.file_path), '') AS file_path, COALESCE(B.like_count, 0) AS like_count, COALESCE(D.chat_count, 0) AS chat_count FROM tbl_auction_item A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT auction_item_id, COUNT(auction_item_id) AS like_count FROM tbl_like GROUP BY auction_item_id ) B ON A.auction_item_id = B.auction_item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT auction_item_id, file_path FROM tbl_file ) C ON A.auction_item_id = C.auction_item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, count(distinct room_id) chat_count FROM tbl_chatting WHERE item_type = 'Auction' GROUP BY item_id ) D ON D.item_id = A.auction_item_id
GROUP BY A.auction_item_id, A.auction_item_name, A.auction_item_explain, A.auction_item_highest_price, A.auction_item_start_price, A.category_id, A.auction_item_status, A.min_bid_amount, A.user_id, B.like_count, D.chat_count
ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
ORDER BY like_count DESC
LIMIT #{page.criteria.amount} OFFSET #{page.criteria.offset}

select round(avg(auction_item_highest_price),0) as avg_price, max(auction_item_highest_price) as max_price, min(auction_item_highest_price) as min_price, count(*) as total_count from tbl_auction_item A

select tai.auction_item_id, tai.user_id, tai.auction_item_name, tai.auction_item_explain, tai.auction_item_start_price, tai.auction_item_highest_price, to_char(tai.auction_item_end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as auction_item_end_time, to_char(tai.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at, tai.category_id, tc1.category_value as category_id_val, tai.auction_item_status, tc2.category_value as auction_item_status_val, tai.min_bid_amount, tai.updated_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_auction_join taj WHERE taj.auction_item_id = tai.auction_item_id) AS auction_item_join_count from tbl_auction_item tai LEFT JOIN tbl_category tc1 ON tc1.category_detail = tai.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_category tc2 ON tc2.category_detail = tai.auction_item_status where 1=1 AND tai.user_id = #{userId} -- AND tai.auction_item_status IN ('201', '202')

select taj.auction_join_id, taj.user_id, taj.auction_item_id, taj.auction_join_price, taj.auction_join_status, tc1.category_value as auction_join_status_val, tai.auction_item_name, tai.auction_item_explain, tai.auction_item_start_price, tai.auction_item_highest_price, to_char(tai.auction_item_end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as auction_item_end_time, to_char(tai.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at, tai.category_id, tc2.category_value as category_id_val from tbl_auction_join taj left join tbl_auction_item tai on tai.auction_item_id = taj.auction_item_id left join tbl_category tc1 ON tc1.category_detail = taj.auction_join_status left join tbl_category tc2 ON tc2.category_detail = tai.category_id where tai.user_id = #{userId}

select tl.like_id, tl.user_id, tai.auction_item_id, tai.user_id, tai.auction_item_name, tai.auction_item_explain, tai.auction_item_start_price, tai.auction_item_highest_price, tai.auction_item_end_time, tai.created_at, tai.category_id, tai.auction_item_status, tc2.category_value as auction_item_status_val, tai.min_bid_amount, tai.updated_at, tai.auction_item_condition, tc1.category_value as category_id_val from tbl_like tl left join tbl_auction_item tai on tl.auction_item_id = tai.auction_item_id LEFT JOIN tbl_category tc1 ON tc1.category_detail = tai.category_id LEFT JOIN tbl_category tc2 ON tc2.category_detail = tai.auction_item_status where tl.user_id = #{userId}
/* 파일 등록을 위한 최근 경매 물품 가져오기 selectLastAuctionItem */ select auction_item_id from tbl_auction_item order by auction_item_id desc limit 1

choose.when: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM tbl_auction_item A
choose.otherwise: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT auction_item_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM tbl_like GROUP BY auction_item_id ) B RIGHT JOIN tbl_auction_item A ON A.auction_item_id = B.auction_item_id

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_auction_join A WHERE A.auction_item_id = B.auction_item_id
mapper.insert: /* 경매 물품 등록 insertAuctionItem */ insert into tbl_auction_item (user_id, auction_item_name, auction_item_explain, auction_item_start_price, auction_item_end_time, category_id, auction_item_status, min_bid_amount, auction_item_condition) values(#{userId}, #{auctionItemName}, #{auctionItemExplain}, #{auctionItemStartPrice}, #{auctionItemEndTime}::timestamp, #{categoryId}, '201', #{auctionItemStartPrice}, #{auctionItemCondition})
INSERT INTO auction_participant (user_id, auction_id, amount) VALUES (#{userId}, #{auctionId}, #{amount})
